member.name: T:DeviceId.Components.FileTokenDeviceIdComponent
member.summary: An implementation of that retrieves its value from a file.
member.remarks: If the file exists, the contents of that file will be used as the component value. If the file does not exist, a new file will be created and populated with a new GUID, which will be used as the component value.

member.name: T:DeviceId.Components.NetworkAdapterDeviceIdComponent
member.summary: An implementation of that retrieves data from installed network adapaters.
member.remarks: Based on Win32_NetworkAdapter WMI class or using the CIMv2 based MSFT_NetAdapter WMI class (Windows 8 and up only). Optionally filters out non physical network adapters (not related to virtual machines) and wireless adapters.

member.name: P:DeviceId.Components.NetworkAdapterDeviceIdComponent.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the component.

member.name: F:DeviceId.Components.NetworkAdapterDeviceIdComponent._excludeNonPhysical
member.summary: A value indicating whether non-physical adapters should be excluded.

member.name: F:DeviceId.Components.NetworkAdapterDeviceIdComponent._excludeWireless
member.summary: A value indicating whether wireless adapters should be excluded.

member.name: M:DeviceId.Components.NetworkAdapterDeviceIdComponent.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A value indicating whether non-physical adapters should be excluded.
Indicates if wireless adapters should be excluded.
member.remarks: Non physical adapters are unlikely to have a stable MAC address. For wireless adapters MAC randomization is a frequently offered function, making it unsuitable for identifying a device.

member.name: M:DeviceId.Components.NetworkAdapterDeviceIdComponent.GetValue
member.summary: Gets the component value.

member.name: M:DeviceId.Components.NetworkAdapterDeviceIdComponent.GetMacAddressesUsingWmi
member.summary: Retrieves the MAC addresses using the (old) Win32_NetworkAdapter WMI class.

member.name: M:DeviceId.Components.NetworkAdapterDeviceIdComponent.GetMacAddressesUsingCimV2
member.summary: Retrieves the MAC addresses using the CIMv2 based MSFT_NetAdapter interface (Windows 8 and up).

member.name: M:DeviceId.Components.NetworkAdapterDeviceIdComponent.FormatMacAddress(System.String)
member.summary: Formats the specified MAC address.
member.param: The MAC address to format.
